data.name: The Puppet of Tersa Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC includes the complete Soundtrack for The Puppet of Tersa: A Curious Place.

Full Track-list;

    ■ 01. The Puppet of Tersa
    ■ 02. Cynthia's Bedroom
    ■ 03. Entrance to Tersa
    ■ 04. Tersian Forest
    ■ 05. Bukit's House
    ■ 06. Bukit's Puzzle
    ■ 07. Lake Theme
    ■ 08. Hamper's Puzzle
    ■ 09. Bukit's House - Night
    ■ 10. Tersian Maze
    ■ 11. Karakim Village
    ■ 12. Toymaker's Shop
    ■ 13. Loom Workshop
    ■ 14. Magic Workshop
    ■ 15. Mountain Pass
    ■ 16. End of Part One
data.about_the_game:
This DLC includes the complete Soundtrack for The Puppet of Tersa: A Curious Place.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Mínimos:
  • SO: Any
  • Processador: Anything really
  • Memória: 4 MB de RAM
  • Placa de vídeo: Tersa
  • Armazenamento: 100 MB de espaço disponível
  • Placa de som: Whatever sounds best to your ears.
  • Outras observações: Don't sweat it, it's music.
